alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:16AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...An outflow boundary producing gusty winds will impact portions of east central Madison Parish, southern Leake, southeastern Warren, Rankin, northeastern Claiborne, northwestern Scott, Hinds and Madison Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 414 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Newport to near Canton to near Pocahontas to Flowers to Mound. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canton, Pocahontas, Sharon, Annandale and Camden around 420 AM CDT. Newman around 425 AM CDT. Madison and Bolton around 430 AM CDT. Ridgeland, Vicksburg and Le Tourneau around 435 AM CDT. Carthage, Learned, Pisgah and Goshen Springs around 440 AM CDT. Pearl, Flowood, Richland and Raymond around 445 AM CDT. Jackson, Lena, Leesburg, Dry Grove, Reganton and Rocky Springs around 450 AM CDT. Brandon, Standing Pine, Tuscola, Branch, Forkville and Monterey around 455 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Delta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. If on or near Ross Barnett Reservoir, get off the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Boats could be damaged or overturned in high winds and suddenly higher waves.

area.areaDesc: Claiborne; Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Warren
